revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Weather Institute |image = [[File:Weather Institute.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Weather Institute. |tokens = 26,000 |location = Route 119 }} '''Weather Institute''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 470,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=5|<center>N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Castform.png|40px]] '''Castform''' || <center> '''1,820,000''' || [[File:Aqua_Admin_(shelly).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Shelly || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha, [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena || <center> 910,000 |- |}
*Must have cleared Weather Institute at least once to unlock Castform
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 1 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 1 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Damp Rock}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.30% || 1.76% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Smooth Rock}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.30% || 1.76% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Heat Rock}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.30% || 1.76% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Icy Rock}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.30% || 1.76% || 2.53% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || 1 || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.25% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Mystic Water}} || 1 || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.25% || 2.02% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Kalos]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
